page.title: 15Religion - continued
page.content: The{Roman Catholic}church was built in 1865, as a Methodist church, but was later taken over. It is also in Solway St. Fr. Jim Glenholm is the priest and there is a service every day at 10.00 and 9.30 on Sundays. Mass is the main service. It is also built of brick and stone. The{Methodist church}meets in a sandstone building in Wampool St. It was formerly the{Congregational church until the two churches combined. It is looked after by visiting ministers and local members. The{Evangelical church was built in the year 1938. Prior to that,the members used to meet in cafes and in houses.They have regular gospel services.
